website_summaries.verdict: An eco-friendly and incredibly affordable buy for non-toxic, grippy yoga socks.
pros: Made from non-toxic cotton that readily absorbs sweat and keeps your foot fungal free
Ergonomically designed, sun-patterned grip keeps you grounded on your mat in various "slippery" poses like warrior 2
No-fuss washing and grip stays sticky after multiple washes
many reviewers love to wear off the mat as well
cons: A minority of reviewers experienced the socks slipping off, possibly an elastic issue, but for others they fit like a second skin

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks but....
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear around the house since most of my floors are tile. They are comfortable and keep my feet warm against the cold tile. The grip pads are also helpful when walking around on the tile floors. They wash well but I have found that after a few wearings they stretch out and start slipping off. I have to keep puling them up. I am pleased with these but wish they did not stretch out so easily. Unsure if I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: RBC

customer_reviews.title: Great socks for barre!
customer_reviews.text: I take barre class and have gone through sticky socks quite quickly. These socks have quickly become my favorite as they fit up my foot (not just at the heel) and the sticky part has actually stayed sticky through a few washes. They are also a little thicker than a normal sock so perfect for walking around the house. I'll definitely be purchasing more of these rather than the socks my studio sells.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Functional, and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These fit me great. I wear a size 10 shoe and have wide feet. These are comfortable and are great if you have hardwood or tile type floors. I also use for yoga. I have been happy with this purchase as would purchase again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Kabami

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality  Damaged Socks
customer_reviews.text: Quality has decreased greatly since my initial set a year ago. Socks are shabby, tattered and damaged. Label wrap around socks is torn and looks as if socks were stuck back in wrapping. These socks are definitely not going on my feet and are being sent back!
customer_reviews.author: DJN

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality - fell apart after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: These socks have started getting holes in them and I've only had them a few months. Also - the grip dots only go about halfway up my foot on the back side - so they rest mostly on my arch. It's really weird. I love this style of sock - and it's a really hard style to find - but these particular socks aren't nearly as good as the brand I bought off of Amazon a couple of years ago (that is no longer selling those socks). I wouldn't buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR HARDWOOD FLOORS
customer_reviews.text: Last year, I purchased 4 pair of these socks in 4 different colors after moving into a place with all hardwood floors. I really loved them. But you know how socks are: TWO go into the washing machine but ONE escapes somewhere on the way to the dryer! I’m 69 years-young with recent knee revision surgery. Not a time to be slipping’n’sliding on slick’n’wicked flooring. So I bought 4 more pair. This time in just two colors, hoping they wouldn’t run away so quickly. These socks with the anti-slip bubbles are perfect for stability! I also love the feel of the material. The sock is the right thickness to wear with sneakers. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: The Louligan

customer_reviews.title: These shed terribly
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very comfortable and slip proof. However, they began pilling and shredding on the first wear. The black socks left black stuff all over the house. Washing didn’t help. I would return these except that I need them now because I can’t comfortably wear a shoe in one foot and my hardwood floors are slippery.
customer_reviews.author: MoMo

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, thick and soft socks. Keeping my feet’s warm, all the time and no slipping on the hardwood floor 👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: I love those socks. I wear them at home all the time. They fit perfectly. I am a size 8.5. I was looking for some new ones and I am happy I purchased them here.... I don’t like the socks to thin, so I get cold feet’s and also when I wear them without shoes, they don’t last very long. This non slip anti skid socks are perfect. Looooove it 😍 If i need more of new ones, I will definitely by them here again....
customer_reviews.author: *** Nice Female Customer ***

customer_reviews.title: Nice sticky dots and good quality sock
customer_reviews.text: My foot is about a size Women's 6 and I think this is a little small because the dots are not exactly on the heel so if your foot is longer, the dots for the heel may end up close to the center bottom of your foot. I think there are still enough dots for traction and the foot part is perfect. I like it that the sock does not slip on the heel. I do wish the logo Dubeebaby was not so prominently displayed but it's ok, I will wear mostly at home.
customer_reviews.author: ATN

customer_reviews.title: Non skid pads are not in the right place
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7 1/2 shoe and these socks do not fit right. The non skid pattern that is supposed to go on the heel is in between my arch and my heel. It seems like they were made in a machine in the machine was off because they non skid pads are just not in the right spot.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hughes Ardito

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical odor to yoga socks.
customer_reviews.text: do yoga socks from this company I received last year were outstanding. These maybe the same yoga sash but after washing twice they still have a very strong chemical odor. Very disappointing. Will return
customer_reviews.author: RKO

customer_reviews.title: Holes on the first wearing.....very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for my yoga class because of the nonslip soles. I got holes in both heels in the one pair the first time I wore them. The material was extremely soft and not at all durable. I was very disappointed. I was prepared to order another set before I realized they were not going to wear well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Yoga/Non-Slip Socks
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these socks. I first started purchasing them to wear in my Pilates classes, but now I wear them every day. They are so comfortable and with hardwood floors, I don’t slip on the floors like when I wear regular socks. I buy both the black and grey socks and the package with the 4 colors as well. I have been buying these socks for several years and I just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Creative Soul

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh
customer_reviews.text: Great socks. I wear mine through the fall and winter months instead of slippers and they work very well. I don't slip on any of my wood or tile floors. My socks have been washed many, many times and they are staying true to size with no deterioration of the grips. I wear a size 4 shoe and the size is perfect for me but they will stretch to fit larger feet than mine. I continue to reorder these socks for my children and my friends also. I have worn them in boots and there haven't been any problems.
customer_reviews.author: 4forall

customer_reviews.title: My favorite yoga sock
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. I wear them for yoga and around the house since I have slippery hardwood floors. They are of great value. I buy them about once a year because I don't follow the instructions and dry them in the dryer. The elastic holds the shape and the non-skid rubber doesn't crack or break off. In my opinion anything that lasts a year after constant use is worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: K Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great for barefoot work at the gym
customer_reviews.text: These work great at the gym when I can't wear shoes with certain exercises. Non-slip and very comfortable. I do recommend washing them inside out before wearing to remove some of the fuzz. I took them off after a session at the gym and my feet were coated in fibers.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lizard Leg

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and a good fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly and the price was worth it. The extra traction on the bottom really helps to keep me from slipping and the thickness is just right. The socks are good quality and haven't fallen apart, yet.
customer_reviews.author: Deej

customer_reviews.title: Very good fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Unlike most non-slip socks I've bought before, which always seem to come off of my feet in the middle of the night or turn around so the non-slip part is at the top of my foot, these stay on securely, and never turn around on me. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Eo

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SOCKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks. I am 73 and am soooooooo happy to find these socks via Amazon. Most comfortable, help keep me balanced and not on the floor. My sister in Mississippi loves them and several friends were so excited the first time they wore them. Helps keep balance during yoga poses and can be worn barefoot on all types of floors. Great for both young and old. Maybe if you are good, Santa may put some under the tree for you. Thanks both DuBeeBaby and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Lacour 73 going on 23

customer_reviews.title: A mixed bag
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, thick, and sturdy. I don't think they're very comfortable on the top of my foot. They may run a bit small. They may be nice for someone with smaller, narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Angie N.

customer_reviews.title: Used socks!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these socks and they are really cute, I like them, except Amazon sent me a set that included a pair of used socks! This is gross. I am now debating whether I just toss the one pair and deal with it, or make a trip to the UPS store or Kohl’s to return them. Either way this is either a rip off or an inconvenience to me. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love wearing them. I needed to find very comfortable socks I could sleep in with grippers on the bottom to keep me from sliding down the bedsheets. Broke my arm and had to sleep sitting up. I would slip down and couldn’t push myself back up because of the broken arm! The grippers on the bottom of these socks grip well. Plus so soft and cozy. My arm is healed and now I have very comfortable socks to wear around the house😊
customer_reviews.author: isabella

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick, grippy socks
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these socks to use during my kickboxing class. My feet get cold super fast so i didn't want to go barefoot. Regular socks are too slippery to wear on the mats so I wanted to find something with some grip to them. These work great! They're thicker than I thought they would be, which is a plus since its currently winter time and my class is early in the morning and the building isn't very warm. I may have to find something thinner for summertime classes, though. Super happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: purpleiriseyes

customer_reviews.title: For more than just Yoga
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my Mum during a recent hospital stay. She loves them because they have better grip then standard nonslip socks or slippers and are far more comfortable then the hospital issue. She especially likes that they don't slip around on her tiny (size 5) feet but are not constricting either. The rolled cuff is also a big hit since her ankles sometimes swell. I will definitely order another package. PS: They washed very well, I line dried them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!! Smells like some kind of fuel!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO disappointed!! These are super cute BUT they smell like some kind of fuel!! I've ordered products before (leggings and such) that smelled like this and ended up throwing them away because there's just no way to wash the odor out...AND it transfers to whatever else is in the washer with it!!! BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carri_i_am

customer_reviews.title: Soft, fitted, grippy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for some good non-slip socks that weren’t bulky. I bought these because I love the colors, however I was pleasantly surprised to realize they are the kind of athletic socks that are fitted in the middle to hug your feet and stay in place. Yay! The material is comfy and the bottoms are SUPER grippy!
customer_reviews.author: Chel

customer_reviews.title: Great Cushy Socks
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are cushy and comfortly stretch to fit my size 11 feet. Not the case in most Yoga Socks I have purchased. I actually use these over my socks as I work with babies and put on the Yoga Socks to wear in the nursery. I bought them thinking I had to take off my other socks first but I did not have to The fact they have so much stretch means they are a really good socks.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect , my favorite socks
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my hospital stay. Easy to put on, comfortable and now my favorite socks!! Perfect for my recovery after knee replacement, didn't worry about slipping.now using in my yoga classes and I've recommended them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Engel (Risalunastar)

customer_reviews.title: Super Cushioned and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of slippers, I forget to put them on and end up walking around barefoot with constantly cold feet. I hate walking around the house in just regular socks because I slip on the tile BUT...these socks are the PERFECT solution for me. They are cushioned and "grippy" so I don't slip when walking. I don't "do yoga" but I would think that these would be great for poses so you don't slip.
customer_reviews.author: Staze Craze

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved how these socks looked in the photo, and didn’t try them on as I do with other clothes, but I wish I did because I would have returned. On me the sock tops come up awkwardly high, accentuated by a roll—since there is a white stripe at the top, the effect is not attractive. I was also disappointed that there was no “new sock” comfortable feeling. I wore them to yoga class, and removed. Trying to decide whether to give them another try or not.
customer_reviews.author: shmarti

customer_reviews.title: If socks can be described as amazing then yes, these are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some grippy socks for around the house and really couldn't be happier. SUPER comfortable, the grippy stuff on the bottom is perfect and they stay up without binding my ankles which is a huge plus. Plan on buying these in every available color for year round happy feet!
customer_reviews.author: siousxie

customer_reviews.title: Do their job and don't cost much. But they're kind of ugly.
customer_reviews.text: They're not attractive at all. The little white rim around the ankle sticks out a lot and looks a bit ridiculous, especially when the soles of your feet are visible to others since the grippy design is hilarious. But aside from looks, they work well and they fit well and they're inexpensive. So it's a win!
customer_reviews.author: slippers

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and I hoped they'd help keep my feet from slipping while doing yoga. Unfortunately all they do is fall off or get wrapped around my foot in a funny way. As I'm moving around, the 'sticky' bottoms cause the sock to shift on my foot in ways that are not helpful to me at all. Wanted to love these but....
customer_reviews.author: NOSNEWS

customer_reviews.title: Too small?
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and colors. However I didn't see where you could select a size and my fit a bit too tight to be comfortable. I wear a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Knudson

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and they just come up to the very bottom of my ankle, but they stay on and work well in yoga. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Lou

customer_reviews.title: Try them for yourself!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little socks! I don’t like to wear shoes indoors but have lots of hardwood and tile floors that are a slip hazard with just socks. The little puff balls on the soles of these yoga socks work perfectly. I plan to buy more:)
customer_reviews.author: Joyful Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear in my yoga class and to keep my feet warm and clean. I wear a size 8.5 and they fit great. Very comfortable. The non skid sole works well for most positions, however, they do move off my foot doing downward dog and warrior 1. Colors are great. I like them overall.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy K

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with limited mobility
customer_reviews.text: My mother has Parkinson's and has a hard time walking. She shuffles a lot and has hard floors. She loves these because they're comfortable for her. Because they are not fluffy, they give her the right amount of grip yet don't stick. I will buy more when these need to be replaced!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely worthless
customer_reviews.text: The socks seems good but after about 10 minutes they weren’t staying on straight and slipping around my feet. So basically terrible for yoga
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E Bills

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It says 4 pack in the description but I only received 1 pair...
customer_reviews.author: Rosie A.

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is too stretchy so socks slip around
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like these yoga/Pilates socks. I do Pilates. These socks slip, not because they don’t grip in the sole, but because the fabric the sock is made of is so soft it slips around on the foot. I stopped using mine after slipping multiple times. They don’t keep me safe.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Feel sticky
customer_reviews.text: I found these socks to be cheaply made. The fabric is not very pleasant and the non-skid soles just have some sticky goo on them. It was too much trouble to return. I use them when I need to clean the shower, so I don't get my sleepers wet and won't slide on the wet tile floor. Other than that, I have no use for them.
customer_reviews.author: LKN

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to slipper socks for elderly folks
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my mom. Yoga? Not so much! She just slips & falls a lot. These are SO much better than slipper socks. They’re loose & move around on her feet. NOT THESE! They stay put! They’re super soft & cute, too. We wash them over & over and they still look new. We’ve ordered 2 sets now. They’re just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: J. BurnettTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great traction
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect slipper replacements when walking around my hardwood floors. They also provide great traction for exercising or doing yoga in my socks, and I don't slide around on the floor any longer. Sometimes they do stick to a yoga mat and twist, so they are better for directly on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Leeie

customer_reviews.title: Thick, great grips.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, soft with fantastic grips. However, you cannot wear them with a sneaker as they are too thick. Wait until you get to yoga or just wear them around the house. Also, I felt the ankle height was a bit short, and would have preferred a slightly higher coverage. They hit at my ankle bone.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C

customer_reviews.title: Twist on my feet during yoga/Strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear during yoga. A waste of money. These socks twist on my feet during Downward dog & Warrior poses. Also, they have a strong chemical smell even after washing.
customer_reviews.author: MLM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect delivery socks.
customer_reviews.text: I knew that the hospital was going to give me non-skid socks but I also know they don’t always fit as expected. I bought these and they fit perfect and they are non-skid. I don’t do yoga, but I imagine they would serve the purpose of non-skidding.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Best socks
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks, I've order 3 times over the years. The tend to last a while and I'm hard on socks (always running around outside in just socks). I'm a clumsy person so the extra grip is great, especially on out wood stairs.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: These socks are amazing! You will want to fill your drawers with them!!!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are AMAZING!!!! So much so that I’m going to be ordering some more!!! I just had two mini strokes and needed socks with grip so my husband bought these for me and they have been a God send!!! They are super soft and the grip is incredible!!! Wonderful! Just wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Keith Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, thick socks!
customer_reviews.text: It's always hard to tell exactly what you are getting from photos, but these are really nice socks. I took a pair with me to the hospital in my delivery bag. They don't loosen up and slide off of your feet. They are warm and the grips don't come off during washings! I highly recommend these! I wear a women's size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Stace

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga socks
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and keep you warm. I wear with shower slippers in in between weather outside. The socks are good for yoga, hospitals, and walking around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Senior mother LOVES
customer_reviews.text: This is the second year I have gotten these socks for my mom. She doesn’t like traditional slippers - but loves these socks because they are warm, comfortable and slip resistant. High quality and durable.
customer_reviews.author: woodchip17

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: They are okay but super thick, much thicker than I expected. For my purpose I would have liked them a little lighter weight so they would fit better. They are soft and do work for anti skid, I could see them being nice and warm in the hospital just not great for yoga/barre.
customer_reviews.author: Mama_Barela

customer_reviews.title: Grips work fine but feet slip out of socks
customer_reviews.text: While the grips on the bottom of the socks work well, I still slip during yoga since my feet slide right out of them. They fit fine but unfortunately I still can't keep them on long during yoga it stretching since I cannot stay stable.
customer_reviews.author: DMM

customer_reviews.title: Soft and sticky
customer_reviews.text: I got these socks so I could do yoga in my company's fitness room without bothering with a yoga mat. They are comfortable, pretty, and most importantly allow me to practice without my feet slipping in any pose so far. Terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Meeks

customer_reviews.title: One of the better yoga socks.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best yoga socks I’ve found. Others are thin and you feel the grippers through the sock. These are comfortable And you don’t feel the grips. They run a little big,looser after washing. But still one of the best overall.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Bright

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks! I bought many pairs in different colors. I originally received a few pairs of these as a gift years ago and have been looking for more to buy. Finally found them on Amazon! The socks are comfortable and have grips on the bottom which are really beneficial to me.
customer_reviews.author: LJE

customer_reviews.title: Treads don't stay on bottom of foot
customer_reviews.text: The sock easily turns and treads don't stay on bottom of foot
customer_reviews.author: Suzetka

customer_reviews.title: These non slip socks are the best I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: I really dig these socks. They are the only non slip socks that not only work, but the socks retain their effectiveness wash after wash! Comfy, not overly warm, breathable. I got these for added safety for when I had my baby and they did not disappoint. Couldn’t recommend these socks more!
customer_reviews.author: Nikita S.

customer_reviews.title: Socks tear easily.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered at least 5 packs of these socks but the last 2 orders have worn through in places other than foot wear. Quality has suffered. I am trying one more time and if the quality does not improve I will stop buying.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Reinardy

customer_reviews.title: I wear them inside out
customer_reviews.text: I use them while I work (give massage) on rug. I wear them inside out so they do not slip off my feet like regular socks. Work well
customer_reviews.author: Ken K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Work Socks
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks. I work landscaping and these are the only short socks that my shoes don't eat. They are thick and comfortable and last quite well. The first time I got these it was for yoga, and I truly wasn't impressed with them for their intended purpose. But I love them now!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wore 3 times just to yoga class and they already are peeling and getting fuzzy looking
customer_reviews.author: Momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Great quality. Hold its shape! Non slip works very well!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! I’ve washed them all several times and they hold up nicely!! Comfortable, great colors, great non skid surface, stays in place! Very thick. I’d buy again!! They do fit very snug!! I wear a 71/2 shoe and they are pretty snug on me!
customer_reviews.author: S Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Smelled horrible
customer_reviews.text: These socks smelled horrible when I took them out of the package. I thought the smell would wash out; but, it infected the entire load of laundry. I re-washed 3 times with vinegar and the entire load of laundry still smelled terrible. I had to throw out all the clothes. These socks cost me a great deal of money. Never, ever again.
customer_reviews.author: saltine

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I was held say that they fit a size 8/9 better than a 7. The slip protection near the heel is on the back of my heel. Plus, they have. That awful "made in China by machines" smell. They are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CINDI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gym class
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Perfect for my workout class at the gym which is better with socks vs shoes. They definitely do not slide on the hardwood. They’re soft and thicker than my regular socks, but I can still wear them with my gym shoes. And they’re cute!
customer_reviews.author: Picky lady

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable yoga socks!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these socks for yoga! They are soft and snuggly, yet hold nicely around my arches. The grips on the bottom are perfect. They are so comfortable, I could simply wear these all day around the house, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but need a little more elastic.
customer_reviews.text: I love the sunshine on the bottoms of these. And the non-skid is great on the hardwood and tile floors. I don’t like that these slip off my heel far too easily. I feel they need a little more elastic around the heel area.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Good Grip
customer_reviews.text: I like most everything about them. I actually wore out my last 4 pairs and ordered more! The only difference, in these pairs compared to the last pairs, is I think they fit a bit loose. They grip, but my feet seem to slide, a bit, inside them. I'd still order more!
customer_reviews.author: bkzonline

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good - now too flimsy —> HOLES
customer_reviews.text: Updated: used to love these. Have bought them for many years. Quality in last year has gone WAY down. Used to get a year’s wear, now lucky to get 4 months before large holes form on heel. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jill in ATL

customer_reviews.title: She loves them
customer_reviews.text: When she gets home from work the work clothes come off and comfy clothes come on and that includes these socks. I have got more remarks of appreciation on these socks. No slipping and comfy to wear around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, thick, colors won’t fade!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very thick. Feet are kept warm and comfortable, but they tend to sweat. The colors are vibrant and they don’t fade after washing. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lusiana

customer_reviews.title: Great for my hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: My feet were sliding when I tried to do yoga on my hardwood floors, these socks are great for non slip, they are comfortable, soft, and I really like them. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and comfortable / well made
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and love the bit of compression I feel on my arches. Never have to worry about sliding because the grips are super.
customer_reviews.author: PuppyBreath

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: OK, they're socks but my wife really likes them. They are comfortable and she actually uses them for her yoga classes. I plan to order more for her.
customer_reviews.author: bikeman315

customer_reviews.title: Better bare foot
customer_reviews.text: I would rate them a big fat 0 if I could. I just received them and noticed that they roll down and they have a bad musky odor. I will be sending them back, unfortunately. I really wanted these socks, too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great. They are a more substantial weave than other yoga socks I have purchased so they are slightly thicker. I like that as they are warmer and very good quality. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Seemed promising, was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was excited by past reviews, however upon receiving the socks I noticed one already had a large hole directly at the big toe, making it unusable. Also, I found the lack of grip rubber in the arch of the foot makes the sock slip more than others with better dispersed grip rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Learis

customer_reviews.title: Lacks durability
customer_reviews.text: These socks are amazing and do and feel as described. The reason for the 4 star review is because one of the socks is falling apart at the ankle. Threads separating. However I would buy again and recommend them
customer_reviews.author: L. Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: I have small feet and they fit great. I have gotten them for people with larger feet and they fit them just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These socks are very comfortable. I recommend them to anyone looking for a ...
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price of these socks. I wear them to pilates and they prevent me from slipping and sliding all over the floor. I have grippy toe socks but they pull on my toes and are uncomfortable. These socks are very comfortable. I recommend them to anyone looking for a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Potter jp

customer_reviews.title: Nice Socks
customer_reviews.text: I like these for yoga. There are a lot of non-slip spots on the sole and that is very helpful. The band around the arch helps to hold the sock in place when you're twisting and moving your body.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Glass

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight For Women's 9W
customer_reviews.text: Too tight for my 9W foot. Positive Attributes: soft, cute, non-slip, comfortable silicone pattern on sole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Thick and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second attempt to buy yoga socks from amazon. The first set (different brand) I tried were thin and uncomfortable. These are the exact opposite. They are soft, thick, and doesn’t make me feel like I’m walking on uncomfortable little balls. I use it for the elliptical, love these.
customer_reviews.author: Rand Chivalry

customer_reviews.title: Nice house socks
customer_reviews.text: Love the grips on the bottom of these socks. They make walking on hardwood floors much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these sock many times over the years. However, the last two orders of 8 socks have been very disappointing. They shrink when washed. I ALWAYS air dry them so they aren't shrunk in the dryer. I used to love these socks. I will find a new brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Reinardy

customer_reviews.title: bought these for my daughter for the Hospital, in ...
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my daughter for the Hospital, in her bag and ready to go !! After the baby is born, Im going have to borrow a pair of these !!!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: The look and feel of the sock was nice. They were "sticky" when they needed to be ...
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel of the sock was nice. They were "sticky" when they needed to be on the mats, however, they were larger than expected. I wear anywhere between a 7-8 size shoe and the sock slipped around on my foot and the sticky part usually ended up on the side of my foot instead of at the bottom. They did get a little more snug after washing them in really hot water but then stretched out again by the end of the exercise session. I ended up giving them away to someone with a larger foot.
customer_reviews.author: MTOM63

customer_reviews.title: Lots of grip!
customer_reviews.text: I love the grip on these! I can wear them on my floors when my feet are cold and not worry about slipping
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C.

customer_reviews.title: For Safety and comfort
customer_reviews.text: It’s for safety! I have lived in these sox for years; they are non-slip on my very slick hardwood floors. Also they are warm. I massage my feet with lotion and then wear these and my feet are great for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft with great grip!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are so comfy! They are soft and have a good stretch to them. The bottom of the sock has good grip and non slip traction which makes walking around in them safer since they arent slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Quality is pretty good. They hold up well in the wash
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9, and these just fit. They're almost snug, but okay. Quality is pretty good. They hold up well in the wash; I put them in a mesh laundry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good socks
customer_reviews.text: These run a bit small, but they are a nice quality, not too thin, and provide just the right grip on tile floors
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Hill

customer_reviews.title: I love the comfort that these socks provide.
customer_reviews.text: I like these sucks so much that this is my third time purchasing this same set. They are comfortable and well-made. I would recommend them to anyone who asked.
customer_reviews.author: michwimp

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I have hard floors and these are great for walking around the house in and not slipping and sliding all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Anti-skid socks work great!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these socks and I love them! They are thick and comfortable, the antiskid on the bottom, grips the floor without putting any pressure on my feet. I would definitely recommend these nonskid socks.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We have tile through whole house, the grips keep her from sliding all over, they’re comfortable and she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grip is in arch of foot
customer_reviews.text: The gripper for the heel is actually placed in the arch. The pink one is from a previous purchase and the black and grey ones are what I just received.
customer_reviews.author: jrking

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and good grip
customer_reviews.text: My aunt is 98 and needs real grip. She wears these all of the time. I bought these three years ago, and she is just now needing more.
customer_reviews.author: C. Koehring

product_meta.title: DubeeBaby Women's Yoga Socks
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported

Antislip design,safely practice: 3d gel dots on the sole of the bottom,shock absorption, cushioning and stability.it is very easy to grip and keep people safety when do the yoga or pilates while traveling, at the studio, or at home.extends fully from heel to toe, giving you enhanced balance and stability.

protect feet from exposure to foot fungus: hygienic alternative to bare feet,socks provide a barrier between your foot and the floor, mat, and equipment, protecting your feet from unwanted dirt and germs.

barefoot feeling: eco-friendly breathable cotton ,with its soft waxy feel.sweat-absorbent superior moisture management,natural cotton absorbs sweat keeps your feet dry and healthy,and elastane to ensure that they fit every foot size and gives you ultimate comfort shape like a second skin.
durable: it's exceptionally good in material and the workmanship is more exquisite,durable for use on or off the mat and in or out of the studio.
